#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    for(;;){
            int m,n,i,j;
            cin>>m>>n;
            if(m==0 && n==0)
                    break;
            char ch[m][n];
            for(i=0;i<m;i++){
            for(j=0;j<n;j++){
                             char c;
                             cin>>c;
                             ch[i][j]=tolower(c);
            }
            }
            int test;
            cin>>test;
            while(test--){
                          string str;
                          cin>>str;
                          int ctr=0;
                          for(i=0;i<m;i++){
                          for(j=0;j<n;j++){
                                           if(ch[i][j]==tolower(str[0])){
                                           if(ch[i][j-1]==tolower(str[1]) && ch[i][j-2]==tolower(str[2])){
                                                                        ctr=-1;
                                                                        cout<<i+1<<" "<<j+1<<endl;
                                                                        break;
                                           }
                                           if(ch[i-1][j-1]==tolower(str[1]) && ch[i-2][j-2]==tolower(str[2])){
                                                                        ctr=-1;
                                                                        cout<<i+1<<" "<<j+1<<endl;
                                                                        break;
                                           }
                                           if(ch[i-1][j]==tolower(str[1]) && ch[i-2][j]==tolower(str[2])){
                                                                        ctr=-1;
                                                                        cout<<i+1<<" "<<j+1<<endl;
                                                                        break;
                                           }
                                           if(ch[i-1][j+1]==tolower(str[1]) && ch[i-2][j+2]==tolower(str[2])){
                                                                        ctr=-1;
                                                                        cout<<i+1<<" "<<j+1<<endl;
                                                                        break;
                                           }
                                           if(ch[i][j+1]==tolower(str[1]) && ch[i][j+2]==tolower(str[2])){
                                                                        ctr=-1;
                                                                        cout<<i+1<<" "<<j+1<<endl;
                                                                        break;
                                           }
                                           if(ch[i+1][j+1]==tolower(str[1]) && ch[i+2][j+2]==tolower(str[2])){
                                                                        ctr=-1;
                                                                        cout<<i+1<<" "<<j+1<<endl;
                                                                        break;
                                           }
                                           if(ch[i+1][j]==tolower(str[1]) && ch[i+2][j]==tolower(str[2])){
                                                                        ctr=-1;
                                                                        cout<<i+1<<" "<<j+1<<endl;
                                                                        break;
                                           }
                                           if(ch[i+1][j-1]==tolower(str[1]) && ch[i+2][j-2]==tolower(str[2])){
                                                                        ctr=-1;
                                                                        cout<<i+1<<" "<<j+1<<endl;
                                                                        break;
                                           }
                                           }
                          }
                          if(ctr<0)
                                   break;
            }
    }
    }
    return 0;
}
